document.full_text: the turkish government said thursday that it is planning to build a second camp to house syrian refugees, after 1,050 more people crossed the border over the last 24 hours.
document.title: syrian refugees flooding into turkey
lines_and_colors: the turkish government said thursday that it is planning to build a second camp to house syrian refugees, after 1,050 more people crossed the border over the last 24 hours.
